text: Krasny Yar () is a rural locality (a village) in Krasnovoskhodsky Selsoviet, Iglinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 66 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 102 km from Iglino, 17 km from Krasny Voskhod. == References == Category:Rural localities in Iglinsky District
title: Krasny Yar, Iglinsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
